title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Strategies to Improve Remote Education Satisfaction in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more instructor-student interaction strategies in blended learning environments
Learners can design strategies for utilizing online personalized learning tools and present actual implementation cases
Learners can establish optimization strategies based on comparative analysis of satisfaction factors in face-to-face/remote learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
